description: Beat the blazing Boise heat with a delightful, fun, and refreshing treat from Kona Ice! You’re invited to flavor your ice your own way using the signature Kona Flavorwave!These sweet & fruity creations are perfect for every occasion, from birthdays, festivals, fundraisers, church events, and everything in between. Come on over to this cool truck and bask in the tropical tunes and delicious bliss brought to you by Kona Ice of Boise!
name: Kona Ice of Boise
